member.name: T:AuthenticodeExaminer.AuthenticodeSignature
member.summary: A class that represents an Authenticode signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.AuthenticodeSignature.SigningCertificate
member.summary: Gets the X509 certificate used in the signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.AuthenticodeSignature.AdditionalCertificates
member.summary: Gets a list of additional certificates provided by the signer in the signature used to assist in chain building for the .

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.AuthenticodeSignature.Contents
member.summary: Provides the raw content of the signature, or null.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.AuthenticodeSignature.DigestAlgorithmName
member.summary: Gets the algorithm used to hash the subject that is signed.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.AuthenticodeSignature.Signature
member.summary: Gets the signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.AuthenticodeSignature.TimestampSignatures
member.summary: Gets a list of counter timestamp signers.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.AuthenticodeSignature.PublisherInformation
member.summary: Gets the signer-provided publisher information on the Authenticode signature. See for additional details.

member.name: T:AuthenticodeExaminer.TimestampSignature
member.summary: Represents a timestamp signature that has counter signed an Authenticode signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.TimestampSignature.SigningCertificate
member.summary: Gets the X509 certificate used in the signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.TimestampSignature.AdditionalCertificates
member.summary: Gets a list of additional certificates provided by the signer in the signature used to assist in chain building for the .

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.TimestampSignature.Contents
member.summary: Provides the raw content of the signature, or null.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.TimestampSignature.DigestAlgorithmName
member.summary: Gets the algorithm used to hash the subject that is signed.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.TimestampSignature.TimestampDateTime
member.summary: Gets a DateTimeOffset of the timestamp's value. This may be null if the timestamp could not be parsed correctly.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.TimestampSignature.Signature
member.summary: Gets the signature.

member.name: T:AuthenticodeExaminer.CmsSignatureBase
member.summary: An abstract class for different signature implementations.

member.name: T:AuthenticodeExaminer.AuthenticodeTimestampCmsSignature
member.summary: A class representing a Authenticode timestamp signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.AuthenticodeTimestampCmsSignature.OwningSignature
member.summary: Gets the signature that owns this timestamp signature.

member.name: T:AuthenticodeExaminer.CmsSignature
member.summary: A class that represents an Authenticode signature.

member.name: T:AuthenticodeExaminer.FileInspector
member.summary: Inspects a file for Authenticode signatures.

member.name: M:AuthenticodeExaminer.FileInspector.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of .
member.param: The path to the file to inspect.

member.name: M:AuthenticodeExaminer.FileInspector.Validate(AuthenticodeExaminer.RevocationChecking)
member.summary: Checks the file for a complete Authenticode signature.
member.param: Indicates how X509 certificate revocation checking should be performed.
member.returns: Returns if the file is correctly signed. Otherwise, returns the failure.

member.name: M:AuthenticodeExaminer.FileInspector.GetSignatures
member.summary: Gets an enumeration of Authenticode signatures for the file.

member.name: T:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature
member.summary: An interface for low-level information about Authenticode signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature.DigestAlgorithm
member.summary: Gets the hashing digest algorithm of the signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature.HashEncryptionAlgorithm
member.summary: Gets the signing algorithm of the signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature.UnsignedAttributes
member.summary: Provides a list of unsigned, or unauthenticated, attributes in the current signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature.SignedAttributes
member.summary: Provides a list of signed, or authenticated, attributes in the current signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature.Certificate
member.summary: Gets the X509 certificate used in the signature.

member.name: M:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature.GetNestedSignatures
member.summary: Gets a list of sub-signatures, such as nested signatures or counter signatures.
member.returns: A read only list of immediate nested signatures.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature.Kind
member.summary: Gets the kind of the signature. For more details, see .

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature.AdditionalCertificates
member.summary: Gets a list of additional certificates in the signature used to assist in chain building to the .

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature.DigestAlgorithmName
member.summary: Gets a representation of the .

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature.Content
member.summary: Provides the raw value of the content of the signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature.SerialNumber
member.summary: Get the serial number of the certificate used to sign the signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.ICmsSignature.Signature
member.summary: Gets the signature.

member.name: T:AuthenticodeExaminer.PublisherInformation
member.summary: Provides information about the publisher information of an Authenticode signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.PublisherInformation.Description
member.summary: Gets a signer-provided description of the Authenticode signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.PublisherInformation.UrlLink
member.summary: Gets a signer-provided URL of the Authenticode signature.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.PublisherInformation.FileLink
member.summary: Gets a signer-provided file of the Authenticode signature. This option is deprecated in Authenticode.

member.name: P:AuthenticodeExaminer.PublisherInformation.IsEmpty
member.summary: Indicates if the current instance of contains any non-empty values.

member.name: M:AuthenticodeExaminer.PublisherInformation.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs an empty instance of .

member.name: M:AuthenticodeExaminer.PublisherInformation.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of from ASN.1 encoded data.
member.param: The ASN.1 encoded data for the publisher information.

member.name: T:AuthenticodeExaminer.RevocationChecking
member.summary: Indicates how revocation checking of the signing certificate should be performed when authenticating an Authenticode signature using .

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.RevocationChecking.None
member.summary: Indicates that no revocation checking should be performed.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.RevocationChecking.Offline
member.summary: Indicates that offline revocation checking should be performed, and contacting the Certificate Authority for a CRL or OCSP response should not be done.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.RevocationChecking.Online
member.summary: Indicates that offline revocation checking should be performed, and contacting the Certificate Authority for a CRL or OCSP response should be done.

member.name: T:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureCheckResult
member.summary: Indicates the result when validating an Authenticode signed file.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureCheckResult.Valid
member.summary: The signature is valid and trusted.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureCheckResult.NoSignature
member.summary: The file does is not Authenticode signed.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureCheckResult.BadDigest
member.summary: The file is signed, however the signed hash does not match the computed hash.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureCheckResult.UnknownProvider
member.summary: The file has a signature, but a provider could not be found to verify its authenticity.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureCheckResult.UntrustedRoot
member.summary: The file is signed with an untrusted certificate.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureCheckResult.ExplicitDistrust
member.summary: The file is signed, however is explicitly distrusted on this system.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureCheckResult.CertificateExpired
member.summary: The certificate used to sign the file is expired.
member.remarks: This can happen if the file is not timestamped and the certificate has expired since it was signed, or the certificate was already expired at the time of signing.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureCheckResult.UnknownFailure
member.summary: The file's signature is not valid for an unknown reason.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureCheckResult.RevokedCertificate
member.summary: The certificate used to sign the file is revoked.
member.remarks: This can happen if the file is not timestamped and the certificate has been revoked, or the certificate was already revoked at the time of signing.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureCheckResult.UnknownSubject
member.summary: The file is not a file type that Windows recognizes for Authenticode.

member.name: T:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureKind
member.summary: A enumeration to indicate the kind of signature.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureKind.NestedSignature
member.summary: The signature is a nested, or appended signature to an existing signature.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureKind.Signature
member.summary: A root signature that is not contained in an existing signature.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureKind.AuthenticodeTimestamp
member.summary: A legacy Authenticode-style timestamp signature.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureKind.Rfc3161Timestamp
member.summary: An RFC3161 compliant timestamp signature.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureKind.AnySignature
member.summary: A bitwise combination of any Authenticode signature.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureKind.AnyCounterSignature
member.summary: A bitwise combination of any counter signature.

member.name: F:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureKind.Any
member.summary: Any kind of signature.

member.name: T:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureTreeInspector
member.summary: Provides low-level access to the Authenticode signatures in a file that allows Inspecting the order and nesting of the signatures.

member.name: M:AuthenticodeExaminer.SignatureTreeInspector.Extract(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the immediate root signatures from a file, or an empty collection if not signed.
member.param: The path to the file to extract signatures from.
member.returns: A collection of signatures in the file.
